query(
	$query: String,
	$queryBuilder: EntitySearchQueryBuilder,
	$sortBy: [EntitySearchSortCriteria],
) { actor { entitySearch(
	query: $query,
	queryBuilder: $queryBuilder,
	sortBy: $sortBy,
) {
	count
	counts {
		count
		facet
	}
	query
	results {
		entities {
			__typename
			account {
				id
				name
				reportingEventTypes
			}
			accountId
			domain
			entityType
			guid
			indexedAt
			name
			permalink
			reporting
			tags {
				key
				values
			}
			type
			... on ApmApplicationEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				applicationId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				language
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on ApmDatabaseInstanceEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				host
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				portOrPath
				reporting
				type
				vendor
			}
			... on ApmExternalServiceEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				host
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on BrowserApplicationEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				applicationId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				servingApmApplicationId
				type
			}
			... on DashboardEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				dashboardParentGuid
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on GenericEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on GenericInfrastructureEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				integrationTypeCode
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on InfrastructureAwsLambdaFunctionEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				integrationTypeCode
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				runtime
				type
			}
			... on InfrastructureHostEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on MobileApplicationEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				applicationId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on SyntheticMonitorEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				monitorId
				monitorType
				monitoredUrl
				name
				period
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on ThirdPartyServiceEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on UnavailableEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
			}
			... on WorkloadEntityOutline {
				__typename
				accountId
				alertSeverity
				createdAt
				domain
				entityType
				guid
				indexedAt
				name
				permalink
				reporting
				type
				updatedAt
			}
		}
		nextCursor
	}
	types {
		count
		domain
		entityType
		type
	}
} } }
